PerfectNetExp.abs: alfilaria添加此单词到默认生词本 [ l fil 'ri ]n.[植]芹叶太阳花 alfilaria [ noun ]European weed naturalized in southwestern United States and Mexico.

means.word_mean: 1. European weed naturalized in southwestern United States and Mexico having reddish decumbent stems with small fernlike leaves and small deep reddish-lavender flowers followed by slender fruits that stick straight up; often grown for forage
